description:
Handheld gaming PCs like the Steam Deck are amazing… but so are the file sizes of modern PC games. Baldur’s Gate III is sitting at over 140GB on my machine (and I don’t even have the Withers Big Naturals mod), which is more than half of the storage of the base model. If you need a little breathing room, today you can grab a 1TB TeamGroup MicroSD card for just $62.99.

With a 110MB/s speed rating for data read, this card should max out the Steam Deck’s MicroSD card slot, allowing for maximum performance for anything stored on it. title: Add 1TB of MicroSD storage to your Steam Deck for just $63
